title: Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp' ASP.NET WebApp, net472
body:
I've tried everything mentioned in https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/513, and none of the suggestions helped. I'm creating this new bug in hope to resurrect the above-closed ticket.

I'm using TallComponents Rasterizer4 and have a ticket about this with them. They use SkiaSharp 1.60.3, and all works fine on my development box running Win 10 Pro, 64bit, with Any CPU selected on my ASP.NET Web App, with .NET Framework 4.7.2 and VS 2019.

But, when I deploy to QA environment which is Win 2012 R2, 64bit, selecting anything from Any CPU, or doing the suggestions mentioned in the above ticket #513  none of them works, I keep getting the exception below.
I even tried upgrading to the latest SkiaSharp version 1.68.0, with no luck.

This the exception I'm getting.

System.TypeInitializationException: The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo' threw an exception. ---> System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp': The specified module could not be found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)
   at SkiaSharp.SkiaApi.sk_colortype_get_default_8888()
   at SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo..cctor()

I really hope someone can point me in the right direction. Thanks.
